# Vilhemsborg_Diversity_Metrics

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of Vilhemsborg_Diversity_Metrics is to generate the diversity metrics for Vilhemsborg based on the data generated in [this repository](https://github.com/Sustainscapes/Targets_vilhelmsborg_community), we will calculate species Richness, Phylogenetic diversity and Rarity for every cell potentially at a 10 meter resolution
